tools.patternNameRequired: Pattern name and at least one field pattern required
tools.instructions: Instructions: Select the label text in the PDF. Use +/- buttons to adjust line offset (default: 0). If offset is 0, the value will be automatically extracted from the same line after the label. Offset can be -1, in that case the whole line will be used including the label.

help.title: User Manual
help.subtitle: Complete guide to using ProManage for property and rent management

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.intro: Welcome to ProManage! This application helps landlords manage their properties, renters, and bills efficiently.
gettingStarted.step1: Add your first property with name and address
gettingStarted.step2: Configure suppliers for the property (electricity, gas, water, etc.)
gettingStarted.step3: Add renters with their contact information and rent details
gettingStarted.step4: Start adding bills manually or set up email sync for automatic import
gettingStarted.step5: Share the renter access link so tenants can view and pay their bills

properties.title: Properties Management
properties.intro: Properties are the core of ProManage. Each property can have multiple renters and bills associated with it.
properties.addPropertyDesc: Click 'Add Property' and enter the property name and full address. The address is important for automatic bill matching when using email sync.
properties.manageSuppliersDesc: Click 'Manage Suppliers' on a property card to add utility suppliers. You can add suppliers with API integration or pattern-based suppliers for PDF extraction.
properties.emailSyncTip: Before enabling email sync, we strongly recommend adding 2-3 months of bills manually for each supplier. This helps the system learn the correct contract IDs and ensures bills are automatically assigned to the right property. Include the Contract ID when adding suppliers to improve matching accuracy.
properties.addBillsDesc: There are several ways to add bills to a property:
properties.addBillManual: Manual entry: Click 'Add Bill' and fill in the details
properties.addBillPdf: PDF upload: Upload a PDF bill and the system will extract data using patterns
properties.addBillEmail: Email sync: Forward bills to your unique email address for automatic import

renters.title: Renters Management
renters.intro: Manage your tenants and their rent payments easily.
renters.addRenterDesc: Click 'Add Renter' on a property card. Enter the renter's name, email, phone number, rent amount, and the day of the month when rent is due.
renters.accessLinkDesc: Each renter gets a unique access link. Share this link with your tenant so they can view their bills and payment details without needing to log in. You can also send it directly via WhatsApp.
renters.rentBillsDesc: Rent bills are automatically generated based on the rent day you set. Use the 'Sync Bills' feature to generate rent bills for all properties at once.

emailSync.title: Email Bill Import
emailSync.intro: Automatically import bills by forwarding them to your unique email address.
emailSync.step1: Go to Settings → Email Bill Import to find your unique forwarding email address
emailSync.step2: Set up email forwarding rules in your email client to forward utility bills to this address
emailSync.step3: Use 'Sync Bills' in the Properties tab to import forwarded bills
emailSync.bestPracticeDesc: For best results, manually add 2-3 months of bills for each supplier BEFORE using email sync. This ensures the system has enough data to correctly match bills to properties using contract IDs and addresses. Always include the Contract ID when setting up suppliers.
emailSync.howItWorksDesc: The system extracts bill data from PDF attachments using text patterns. It matches bills to properties based on contract ID, address, and supplier. Bills with high confidence are automatically assigned; others may need manual confirmation.

tools.title: Tools - Pattern Creation
tools.intro: Create extraction patterns to automatically extract data from PDF bills.
tools.createPatternDesc: Use this tab to create new extraction patterns for suppliers that don't have existing patterns.
tools.createStep1: Upload a sample PDF bill from the supplier
tools.createStep2: Select a field from the dropdown (e.g., Amount, Bill Number)
tools.createStep3: Highlight the label text in the PDF that precedes the value you want to extract
tools.createStep4: Adjust the line offset if the value is on a different line than the label
tools.createStep5: Repeat for all important fields, then save the pattern with a name
tools.importantFieldsDesc: For best extraction results, define patterns for these fields:
tools.fieldAmount: The bill amount (required for all bills)
tools.fieldDueDate: When the bill needs to be paid
tools.fieldContractId: Critical for matching bills to the correct property
tools.matchPatternDesc: Upload a PDF to test which patterns match and see the extracted data. The system shows confidence scores for each matching pattern.
tools.editPatternDesc: Administrators can edit existing patterns to improve extraction accuracy.

ebloc.title: E-Bloc Import
ebloc.intro: Import properties and bills from your E-Bloc.ro account.
ebloc.step1: Click 'Import from E-Bloc' in the Properties tab
ebloc.step2: Enter your E-Bloc.ro username and password
ebloc.step3: Click 'Discover Properties' to see available properties
ebloc.step4: Select the properties you want to import
ebloc.step5: Click 'Import Selected' or 'Import All' to complete the import
ebloc.imported2: Pay notices can be uploaded as PDF like anormal bill
ebloc.imported3: Or sent to the special emayl for sync for Pro version
ebloc.privacyNoteDesc: Your E-Bloc credentials are used only for the import process and are NOT stored. The import is a one-time operation.

notifications.title: Payment Notifications
notifications.intro: Manage payment notifications from your renters.
notifications.paymentNotificationsDesc: When a renter marks a bill as paid through their portal, you receive a notification. Review the payment details and confirm or reject the payment.
notifications.confirmDesc: Mark the payment as received and update the bill status to paid
notifications.rejectDesc: Reject the payment notification if the payment was not received
notifications.clearAllDesc: Delete all notifications in the current tab

settings.title: Settings
settings.intro: Configure your account settings and preferences.
settings.personalDetailsDesc: Set your name, phone number, and IBAN accounts for receiving rent payments. These details appear on rent bills sent to tenants.
settings.emailConfigDesc: Find your unique email address for bill forwarding and configure email sync settings.
settings.rentBillsSettingsDesc: Configure default settings for rent bills including currency, payment details, and automatic rent bill generation preferences.

subscription.title: Subscription Plans
subscription.intro: Choose the plan that fits your needs.
subscription.proFeature1: As many properties as you want to pay for

utility.payOnlineDescription: Pay your utility bill directly through our secure payment system
utility.enterBarcode: Enter the barcode from your utility bill to identify the supplier.
utility.multipleSuppliers: Multiple suppliers matched. Please select one:
utility.landlordPaymentNote: As landlord, this payment will be charged to your account.
utility.renterPaymentNote: This payment will be processed immediately.
utility.barcodeNoMatch: Barcode did not match any supplier. Please select from the list below.
